trans-unit.source: REST-Based Application Lifecycle Sample | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: REST-Based Application Lifecycle Sample | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: A Microsoft Azure Service Fabric sample that shows the Application Lifecycle by using the Service Fabric REST interface.
trans-unit.target: A Microsoft Azure Service Fabric sample that shows the Application Lifecycle by using the Service Fabric REST interface.

trans-unit.source: REST-based application lifecycle sample
trans-unit.target: REST-based application lifecycle sample

trans-unit.source: This sample demonstrates the Service Fabric application lifecycle through REST API calls.
trans-unit.target: This sample demonstrates the Service Fabric application lifecycle through REST API calls.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Service Fabric application lifecycle, see [Service Fabric Application Lifecycle](service-fabric-application-lifecycle.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information on the Service Fabric application lifecycle, see [Service Fabric Application Lifecycle](service-fabric-application-lifecycle.md).

trans-unit.source: This sample performs the following:
trans-unit.target: This sample performs the following:

trans-unit.source: Provisions the WordCount 1.0.0.0 sample from the WordCount application package in the ImageStore.
trans-unit.target: Provisions the WordCount 1.0.0.0 sample from the WordCount application package in the ImageStore.

trans-unit.source: Displays the list of application types, which includes WordCount 1.0.0.0.
trans-unit.target: Displays the list of application types, which includes WordCount 1.0.0.0.

trans-unit.source: Creates the WordCount application as fabric:/WordCount.
trans-unit.target: Creates the WordCount application as fabric:/WordCount.

trans-unit.source: Displays the list of applications, which includes fabric:/WordCount version 1.0.0.0.
trans-unit.target: Displays the list of applications, which includes fabric:/WordCount version 1.0.0.0.

trans-unit.source: Provisions the 1.1.0.0 version of the WordCount sample from the WordCountUpgrade application package in the ImageStore.
trans-unit.target: Provisions the 1.1.0.0 version of the WordCount sample from the WordCountUpgrade application package in the ImageStore.

trans-unit.source: Displays the list of application types, which includes both WordCount 1.0.0.0 and WordCount 1.1.0.0.
trans-unit.target: Displays the list of application types, which includes both WordCount 1.0.0.0 and WordCount 1.1.0.0.

trans-unit.source: Upgrades the WordCount application to version 1.1.0.0.
trans-unit.target: Upgrades the WordCount application to version 1.1.0.0.

trans-unit.source: Displays the list of applications, which includes WordCount version 1.1.0.0, but no longer includes WordCount version 1.0.0.0.
trans-unit.target: Displays the list of applications, which includes WordCount version 1.1.0.0, but no longer includes WordCount version 1.0.0.0.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the WordCount application.
trans-unit.target: Deletes the WordCount application.

trans-unit.source: Displays the list of applications, which no longer includes fabric:/WordCount.
trans-unit.target: Displays the list of applications, which no longer includes fabric:/WordCount.

trans-unit.source: Unprovisions the 1.1.0.0 version of the WordCount sample.
trans-unit.target: Unprovisions the 1.1.0.0 version of the WordCount sample.

trans-unit.source: Displays the list of application types, which includes WordCount 1.0.0.0, but no longer includes WordCount 1.1.0.0.
trans-unit.target: Displays the list of application types, which includes WordCount 1.0.0.0, but no longer includes WordCount 1.1.0.0.

trans-unit.source: Unprovisions the 1.0.0.0 version of the WordCount sample.
trans-unit.target: Unprovisions the 1.0.0.0 version of the WordCount sample.

trans-unit.source: Displays the list of application types, which no longer includes WordCount.
trans-unit.target: Displays the list of application types, which no longer includes WordCount.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: This sample uses the [WordCount sample](https://github.com/azure/servicefabric-samples).
trans-unit.target: This sample uses the [WordCount sample](https://github.com/azure/servicefabric-samples).

trans-unit.source: The WordCount sample must first be built and then two application packages must be copied to the ImageStore.
trans-unit.target: The WordCount sample must first be built and then two application packages must be copied to the ImageStore.

trans-unit.source: Folder
trans-unit.target: Folder

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: WordCount
trans-unit.target: WordCount

trans-unit.source: The WordCount sample application.
trans-unit.target: The WordCount sample application.

trans-unit.source: The ApplicationManifest.xml contains ApplicationTypeVersion="1.0.0.0".
trans-unit.target: The ApplicationManifest.xml contains ApplicationTypeVersion="1.0.0.0".

trans-unit.source: WordCountUpgrade
trans-unit.target: WordCountUpgrade

trans-unit.source: The WordCount sample application.
trans-unit.target: The WordCount sample application.

trans-unit.source: The ApplicationManifest.xml file must be changed to ApplicationTypeVersion="1.1.0.0" to allow the application upgrade to occur.
trans-unit.target: The ApplicationManifest.xml file must be changed to ApplicationTypeVersion="1.1.0.0" to allow the application upgrade to occur.

trans-unit.source: To create the application packages and copy them to the ImageStore, take the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To create the application packages and copy them to the ImageStore, take the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Copy C:\Samples\Services\VS2015\WordCountUpgrade\WordCount\pkg\Debug to C:\Temp\WordCount.
trans-unit.target: Copy C:\Samples\Services\VS2015\WordCountUpgrade\WordCount\pkg\Debug to C:\Temp\WordCount.

trans-unit.source: This creates the WordCount application package.
trans-unit.target: This creates the WordCount application package.

trans-unit.source: Copy C:\Temp\WordCount to C:\Temp\WordCountUpgrade.
trans-unit.target: Copy C:\Temp\WordCount to C:\Temp\WordCountUpgrade.

trans-unit.source: This creates the WordCountUpgrade application package.
trans-unit.target: This creates the WordCountUpgrade application package.

trans-unit.source: Open C:\Temp\WordCountUpgrade\ApplicationManifest.xml in a text editor.
trans-unit.target: Open C:\Temp\WordCountUpgrade\ApplicationManifest.xml in a text editor.

trans-unit.source: In the ApplicationManifest element, change the ApplicationTypeVersion attribute to "1.1.0.0".
trans-unit.target: In the ApplicationManifest element, change the ApplicationTypeVersion attribute to "1.1.0.0".

trans-unit.source: This updates the version number of the application.
trans-unit.target: This updates the version number of the application.

trans-unit.source: Save the changed ApplicationManifest.xml file.
trans-unit.target: Save the changed ApplicationManifest.xml file.

trans-unit.source: Run the following PowerShell script as an administrator to copy the applications to the ImageStore:
trans-unit.target: Run the following PowerShell script as an administrator to copy the applications to the ImageStore:

trans-unit.source: After the PowerShell script completes, this application will be ready to run.
trans-unit.target: After the PowerShell script completes, this application will be ready to run.

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: Example

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the Service Fabric application lifecycle.
trans-unit.target: The following example demonstrates the Service Fabric application lifecycle.

trans-unit.source:
## Next steps

trans-unit.target:
